meanings.definition: The quality or state of being polite.
meanings.sent1: Her politeness towards the elderly gentleman was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your politeness in holding the door open for me.
meanings.sent3: The robot's politeness malfunction made it compliment everyone's shoes.
meanings.sent4: The politeness of the flowers as they turned towards the sun was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The politeness of the waves as they gently lapped against the shore was calming.

meanings.definition: Behavior that is respectful and considerate of others.

meanings.sent2: Politeness is important in creating a harmonious work environment.
meanings.sent3: The politeness of the squirrel as it shared its acorn with the bird was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The politeness of the stars as they twinkled in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The politeness of the clouds as they made way for the sun was a beautiful sight.
